name: Mutant Snake (AlexKiri)
description:
Classic Nokia 3310 Snake with a twist

A Nokia 3310 Jam 3 submission

The snake is controlled turn based.

The  power-up is worth 1 point and increases the snake length.

The  power-up is worth 10 points and causes the snake to mutate: an additional head will grow.

The snake can grow multiple heads. Don't try to control the extra heads, they move by themselves to any available space.

The game is over when any snake head has no place to move.

Controls:

Arrow keys control Snake

Space restarts after Game Over

Programming and graphics: alexkiri

Font: Tiny, created By Matthew Welch
